Description:
Requirements:Non-degree tertiary education, associate degree holder or equivalent 
With internship experience in business operations / customer service / settlement / payment  
Knowledge of products and process in financial industry will be an advantages 
Good command in written and spoken English 
Familiar in Chinese word-processing, MS Office Word and Excel 
Positive attitude and strong desire to deliver exceptional results with great attention to accuracy and detail 
Independent, self-motivated, proactive and strong problem-solving skills 
Immediate available or short notice will be an advantage Job Details
